item.title: SoftLayer_Location_Reservation
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Reservation Service Datatype Description Methods getAccount Retrieve the account that a billing item belongs to. getAccountReservations getAllotment Retrieve the bandwidth allotment that the reservation belongs to. getBillingItem Retrieve the bandwidth allotment that the reservation belongs to. getLocation Retrieve the datacenter location that the reservation belongs to. getLocationReservationRack Retrieve rack information for the reservation getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Location_Reservation record.
